headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Devon Energy After Oil Prices Slide in Early 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Devon Energy stock? You’re not alone. With oil markets in the headlines and energy stocks swinging, it’s no surprise that investors are giving this one a closer look. Devon Energy’s share price recently closed at $32.50, and while the short-term moves might look wobbly due to a dip of 6.0% over the last week and 8.5% over the last month, the bigger picture tells a much more nuanced story. Year-to-date, the stock is down 2.7%, and over the past year, it’s off by...
